Text:
Oh and just in case it isn't clear, this is a fan mix. 

I am not Trent Reznor or affiliated with anyone from the NIN camp.

Some people at ETS asked me to upload this, so I did.
Thanx for the upload and giving The Fragile a breath of fresh air! If i had to choose a fave album The Fragile would be at the top of the list.

Thanks for the positive comment.

To everybody downloading this, I've seeded to 7.5 and I need to give my computer a break. Don't worry though I will be back on tomorrow at 11AM.
the only source of Appendage is the cassette version of The Fragile. it's not been released in a digital format (yet).
very interesting. there are a lot of remixes of the fragile out there. i enjoy this album a lot so ill give it a try and send some feedback.
Please seed! This looks like a very interesting reimagination!
